text: Norma Riley is an electrical engineer at Northrop Grumman Corporation in Albuquerque, New Mexico. She was named a Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2014 for her contributions to ultra- wideband phased array technologies. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:American electrical engineers Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE
title: Norma Riley
